body.name: PandaEar Baby Toddler Fork and Spoon Utensil Set, 6 Pack Silicone Stainless Steel Silverware Spoon Fork for Babies Toddler, BPA Free with Silicone Holding Anti-Choke Design (Blue&Green&Light Tan)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 25 mins
features: PERFECT FOR BABIES AND TODDLERS: Each utensil in our stainless-steel set comes with rounded edges and tines to ensure the safety of your little one during their meal time. Each spoon is small and curved to create a comfortable dining experience for your child, while our knives feature a different design on each side, to minimize the risk of injury

TOTALLY SAFE: The Panda Ear Stainless-Steel Utensil Set is made with the highest-quality 100% stainless-steel. In addition, this utensil set is also dishwasher-safe, non-toxic, and free of all BPAs. With our special safety precautions, you can rest easy knowing that your child is eating off of only the highest-quality utensils

COMPLETE SET: The PandaEar Stainless-Steel Utensil Set comes with everything you and your child could ever need for mealtime, including: 3 smooth and rounded spoons, 3 rounded and safety-proofed forks. This kit has everything you need in one compact set

EASY TO CLEAN: This stainless-steel set is dishwasher safe, making clean up time a complete breeze. Made with high-quality stainless-steel, every single piece is easy to wipe down, clean, and keep sanitary. The plastic carrying case is also easy to wipe down and keep clean, ensuring that your utensils stay sanitary

PERFECT SIZE: These utensils were especially designed to fit in the hands of little ones. With the perfectly shaped handles, these Baby Utensils are perfect for toddlers and young children learning how to eat on their own. Their miniature size also makes them ideal for traveling and eating on-the-go
body.description: Introducing the Stainless-Steel Utensil Set, a safe set of easy to use utensils for babies, toddlers and young children, brought to you by PandaEar.Make meal time at home, or on-the-go easy and convenient with our portable Stainless-Steel Baby Utensil SetSafety You Can TrustWe believe your little angel deserves nothing less than the best. That’s why the PandaEar Utensil Set is made with ONLY the highest quality of materials. We use only 100% stainless-steel that is non-toxic and free from BPA, PVC, as well as all phthalates.Easy-to-Clean Stainless-SteelIn addition to its safety, stainless-steel is a fantastic option for those looking for something that is easy to clean and keep sanitary. It is completely dishwasher safe, as well as easy to rinse and wipe down. Perfectly Child-ProofYoung children need special safety precautions. That’s why our utensils are rounded, to help prevent any risk of injury to your little angel. Our forks are rounded and curved, while our knives are completely smooth on one side. The small size and curved handles make these utensils comfortable in your toddler’s hand while they learn how to eat for themselves. What You’ll ReceiveWith your purchase of your PandaEar Stainless-Steel Baby Utensil Set, you will receive:3x Rounded and gentle baby spoons3x Rounded and gentle baby forksDon’t Delay, Make Meal Time Effortless and Easy Today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe and sturdy, perfect for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: This was a Christmas gift for my toddler grandson. The spoons and forks are perfect as they are chunky so that they are easy to hold. They are sturdy as well, but must be washed by hand, not dishwasher. Best of all, the toddler is not able to choke as with a regular spoon or fork, because of the design of the forks and spoons. His parents loved this gift and they are used every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves the set. I love how they fit so perfectly in her hand and handle is just perfect material for grip and stopping her from shaving it down her throat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Easy to Hold for Baby
reviews.reviewText: These are very cute and easy for my 10 month old to hold. Now getting him to keep hold versus tossing to the floor is its own challenge, lol but when he does have interest he does great bringing them to his mouth. The mouth guard so can’t shove to far into his mouth is nice as some of his other utensils he’ll do so with and choke himself on. The fork tines are agile enough to spear food much better than some of those plastic or silicon baby forks but dull/rounded enough that I’m not too concerned when he occasionally misses his mouth with his aim.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Has held up to many washes for my 15 month old. A nice transition utensil set from all plastic or silicone training forks and spoons

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my little one and she loves them! These fit perfect in her hand.

reviews.reviewText: Baby has no issues picking these up, great practice utensils
Beau produit et livraison rapide merci

Love this stainless steel set of baby utensils. Easy to hold and good value. The spoon and fork are the perfect size and length for my 17 month old baby's hands to hold and self feed. A lot of utensils are too big/long and make it hard for my baby to control and get it to her mouth. My baby just started getting interested in using forks. She loves using the fork. It is small, blunt (but still sharp enough to pierce food) and the barrier makes it so she can't stick it too far into her mouth. Wish there were more colour options but it is a great set.
Sehr tolle Qualität und passt perfekt für Babyhand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Great colours and easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: These forks and spoons come in gorgeous muted colours. They are easy to clean and great for weaning. My baby loves these for their shape and grip. Not bad value either.

Das Besteck kam heute an, wurde direkt durch die Spülmaschine gejagt und danach direkt vom Kind (14Monate alt) getestet. Das Essen klappt damit richtig super. Das Besteck macht einen stabilen und guten Eindruck.Wie würden es auf jeden Fall empfehlen.
